Technique: Boot or Logon Autostart Execution: Registry Run Keys / Startup Folder
Use: A dropper used by Putter Panda installs itself into the ASEP Registry key HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run with a value named McUpdate. [1]

Technique: Impair Defenses: Disable or Modify Tools
Use: Malware used by Putter Panda attempts to terminate processes corresponding to two components of Sophos Anti-Virus (SAVAdminService.exe and SavService.exe). [1]

Technique: Obfuscated Files or Information: Encrypted/Encoded File
Use: Droppers used by Putter Panda use RC4 or a 16-byte XOR key consisting of the bytes 0xA0 â€“ 0xAF to obfuscate payloads. [1]

An executable dropped onto victims by Putter Panda aims to inject the specified DLL into a process that would normally be accessing the network, including Outlook Express (msinm.exe), Outlook (outlook.exe), Internet Explorer (iexplore.exe), and Firefox (firefox.exe). [1]
